00001 <h2>Track your favorite apps!</h2>

00006 <p>
00007         IUseThis Widget brings the familiar user counter from iusethis.com on your Dashboard.
00008 </p>
00009 <p>
00010         Choose the app you want to track by entering its shortname in the back preferences pane and
00011         you&rsquo;re done!
00012 </p>
00013 <p>
00014         Minimum system requirements are Mac OS X 10.4 "Tiger" or later, and an Internet connection
00015         (broadband recommended).
00016 </p>
